Description: Glazed composition shabti with a striated lappet-wig, a modelled face with a plaited beard, crossed hands in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the string of the incised seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder, the waist is inscribed with two rows of worn or softly incised, now illegible hieroglyphs, the front of the leg section is inscribed with a similar column; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
